name: NFTs are Bad
description:
Can you escape? 

NFTs are Bad is a short 2D platformer where you explore the negatives of NFTs. Jump, Climb and Shoot your way through the level while avoiding the various obstacles and major changes to climate.

Controls:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump - Space

Shoot - Enter

Escape - Pause
